title: Maintenance and sharpening of power saw chains
brief_description: Unsatisfactory performance and service of power saw chains is usually due to inadequate maintenance. Shows three basic rules for maintenance: check chain tension; check oiling system and use only correct oil; regularly “touch up” chain cutting teeth with file without removing from saw.
